	, respectively,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	of f
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	ully depreciated assets.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Total depreciation and amortization expense was $
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	.4&nbsp;million, $2.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	4
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;million and $2.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	6
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;million for the years ended December&nbsp;31, 201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, 201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	4
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	and 201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	3
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, respectively
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	8. LONG
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&#8209;TERM OBLIGATIONS
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	We currently lease our research and office space under a noncancelable lease agreement with our landlord, HCP BTC,&nbsp;LLC (formerly known as Slough BTC,&nbsp;LLC) which expires in 2018. The lease term provides for renewal option for up to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	two
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	additional period
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	five
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	years each, and rental payments on a graduated scale. We determined our existing lease agreement to be an operating lease and recognize rent expense on a straight
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;line basis over the lease period.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	In December 2014, we entered into a sublease agreement with an unrelated third party to occupy a portion of our research and office space
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	. W
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	e expect to receive over
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	.0
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	million in future sublease income (excluding our subtenant&#x2019;s share
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	facilities operating expenses) over the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	remaining
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	term of the sublease. In connection with this sublease, we recognized
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	a &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	loss on sublease of $9.3 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	during the fourth quarter of 2014
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;We record rent expense on a straight
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	-
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	line basis for our lease, net of sublease income, wherein such arrangements contain scheduled rent increases over the term of the lease and sublease, respectively.&nbsp;&nbsp;For our sublease arrangement which we classified as
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	an
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	operating lease, our loss on the sublease
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	was
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	comprised of the present value of our future payments to our landlord less the present value of our future rent payments expected from our subtenant over the term of the sublease.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Further, in conjunction with our facilities lease, we have previously issued to our landlord warrants to purchase our common stock.&nbsp;&nbsp;We have previously capitalized the fair value of these warrants
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	at issuance
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	as part of our other long-term assets and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	they are
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	being amortized over the term of our lease.&nbsp;&nbsp;As a result of the sublease agreement that we entered into in December 2014, we included approximately
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$265,000
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	representing the unamortized portion of the warrant fair value attributable to the sublet space in the determination of our loss on sublease (see Note 9). The liability arising from this sublease agreement was determined using a credit-adjusted risk-free rate to discount the estimated future net cash flows.&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The changes in the liability related to the sublease agreement during the year ended December 31, 2015 were as follows (in thousands):
</FONT>
</P>

Our board of directors is authorized to fix or alter the designation, powers, preferences and rights of the shares of each series of preferred shares, and the qualifications, limitations or restrictions of any wholly unissued shares, to establish from time to time the number of shares constituting any such series, and to increase or decrease the number of shares, if any.

</FONT>

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">

</FONT>

	. This amount has been capitalized in other long
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	5

	, approximately
</FONT>

	58

	,000

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Controlled Equity Offering
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	In August 2015, we entered into a Controlled Equity Offering
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:5PT;TOP:-4PT;POSITION:RELATIVE;LINE-HEIGHT:100%">
	SM
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:6.5PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Sales Agreement with Cantor, as sales agent, pursuant to which we may sell, through Cantor, up to an aggregate of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$30.0
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	million in shares of our common stock. All sales of our common stock will be made pursuant to a shelf registration statement that was declared effective by the Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) on July 13, 2015. Cantor is acting as our sole sales agent for any sales made under the Sales Agreement for a low single-digit commission on gross proceeds. The common stock is being sold at prevailing market prices at the time of the sale. Unless otherwise terminated earlier, the Controlled Equity Offering
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:5PT;TOP:-4PT;POSITION:RELATIVE;LINE-HEIGHT:100%">
	SM
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:6.5PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Sales Agreement continues until all shares available under the agreement have been sold.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF;">
	During the year ended Dece
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF;">
	mber&nbsp;31, 2015, approximately,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF;">
	1,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF;">
	7
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF;">
	22,312
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF;">
	shares of our common stock were sold under the Sales Agreement
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF;">
	with
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF;">
	aggregate net proceeds of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF;">
	$5.5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF;">
	million. At December&nbsp;31, 2015, we had approximately
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF;">
	$24.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF;">
	3
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF;">
	million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF;">
	in shares
</FONT>

	10. INCOME TAXES
</FONT>
</P>

<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" STYLE="WIDTH:02.98%;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-LEFT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-RIGHT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;PADDING:0PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	%&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" STYLE="WIDTH:04.96%;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-LEFT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:2PT DOUBLE #000000 ;BORDER-RIGHT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-RIGHT:3PT;TEXT-ALIGN:RIGHT;" NOWRAP="NOWRAP">
<DIV STYLE="FLOAT:LEFT">
</DIV>
	0.0
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" STYLE="WIDTH:02.36%;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-LEFT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-RIGHT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;PADDING:0PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	%&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
</EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	In general, under Section&nbsp;382 of the Internal Revenue Code (Section&nbsp;382), a corporation that undergoes an ownership change is subject to limitations on its ability to utilize its pre
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;change net operating loss carryovers and tax credits to offset future taxable income. Our existing net operating loss carryforwards and tax credits are subject to limitations arising from ownership changes which occurred in previous periods. We finalized our analysis of potential ownership changes and concluded our Section&nbsp;382 owner shift analysis during the year ended December&nbsp;31, 2012. We have updated our net operating loss carryforwards to reflect the results of the Section&nbsp;382 owner shift analysis as of December&nbsp;31, 201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	. We did not experience any significant changes in ownership in 201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	and 201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	4
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	. Future changes in our stock ownership, some of which are outside of our control, could result in an ownership change under Section&nbsp;382 and result in additional limitations.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	As of December&nbsp;31, 201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, we had net operating loss carryforwards for federal income tax purposes of approximately
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$764.7
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;million, which expire beginning in the year 2019 and state net operating loss carryforwards of approximately
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$424.8
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;million, which expire beginning in the year 201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	6
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	We had elected the three-factor apportionment formula pursuant to the Multistate Tax Compact, or MTC in determining the state net operating loss carryforwards for 2013 and 2014. In December 2015, the California Supreme Court overturned the California Appellate court decision on The Gillette Company et al. v. California Franchise Tax Board. The court held that the taxpayers couldn&#x2019;t elect an evenly weighted, three-factor apportionment formula pursuant to the MTC. As a result of the California Supreme Court decision, we reduced our deferred tax assets and offsetting valuation allowance related to the California NOL calculated in 2013 and 2014 pursuant to the MTC election.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	We have general business credits
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	of approximately
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$25.6
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;million, which will expire beginning in 2023, if not utilized, and is comprised of research and development credits and orphan drug credits. We also have state research and development tax credits of approximately
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$23.6
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;million, which have no expiration date.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Realization of deferred tax assets is dependent upon future earnings, if any, the timing and amount of which are uncertain. Accordingly, the net deferred tax assets have been fully offset by a valuation allowance. The valuation allowance
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	decreased by approximately
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$14.2
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;million and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	increased by approximately
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$62.6
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;million for the years ended December&nbsp;31, 201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	and 201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	4
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, respectively.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Included in the valuation allowance balance at December&nbsp;31, 201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	and 201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	4
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	is approximately
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$2.5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;million of tax deductions related to the exercise of stock options prior to the adoption of ASC 718 which have not reflected as an expense for financial reporting purposes. Accordingly, any future reduction in the valuation allowance relating to this amount will be credited directly to equity and not reflected as an income tax benefit in the statement of operations. As a result of certain realization requirements, the table of deferred tax assets and liabilities shown above does not include loss carryforward tax assets of approximately
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$1.7
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;million at December&nbsp;31, 201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	and 201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	4
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	that arose directly from (or the use of which was postponed by) tax deductions related to stock
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;based compensation expense in excess of compensation expense recognized for financial reporting. Equity will be increased by approximately
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$1.7
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;million if and when such deferred tax assets are ultimately realized.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Included in the balance of unrecognized tax benefits at December&nbsp;31, 201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	and 201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	4
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, respectively, are
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$12.2
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;million and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$4.3
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;million of tax benefits that, if recognized, would result in adjustments to other tax accounts, primarily deferred taxes.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	No
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	income tax benefit would be realized due to the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	C
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	ompany&#x2019;s valuation allowance position. We do not anticipate a significant change to the unrecognized tax benefits over the next twelve months.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	We are subject to taxation in the United States and in California. Because of net operating loss and research credit carryovers, substantially all of our tax years remain open to examination.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Our policy is that we recognize interest and penalties accrued on any unrecognized tax benefits as a component of income tax expense. We currently have no tax positions that would be subject to interest or penalties.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	11
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	. SEVERANCE AGREEMENT WITH FORMER CEO
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	In 2014, we entered into a severance agreement with our former CEO pursuant to his resignation as CEO and member of the Board of Directors effective November 20, 2014, and his
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	retirement
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	effective December 31, 2014. The severance agreement provides for cash severance payments of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$1.1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	million payable in installments over a duration of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	18
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	months beginning on January 1, 2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	which is included as part of the Accrued Compensation account in the Balance Sheets
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;Also as part of the severance arrangement, we extended the date to which our former CEO had the right to exercise his vested options. In addition, we also accelerated the vesting of certain of his unvested stock options (refer to Note 4).
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The change in the severance liability to our former CEO
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	during the year ended December 31
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, 2015 was as follows (in thousands):
</FONT>
</P>

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Item&nbsp;9.&nbsp;&nbsp;Changes in and Disagreements with Accountants on Accounting and Financial Disclosur
</FONT>

	e

<EFX_CONTROL_AND_PROCEDURES>
<A NAME="FIS_CONTROL_AND_PROCEDURES"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Item&nbsp;9A.&nbsp;&nbsp;Controls and Procedure
</FONT>
<A NAME="RIGL-20151231X10K_HTM_ITEM9ACONTROLSANDPROCEDURES_13119">
</A>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	s
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Conclusion Regarding the Effectiveness of Disclosure Controls and Procedures
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Under the supervision and with the participation of our management, including our principal executive officer and principal financial officer, we conducted an evaluation of our disclosure controls and procedures, as such term is defined under Rule&nbsp;13a
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;15(e) promulgated under the Exchange Act. Based on this evaluation, our principal executive officer and our principal financial officer concluded that our disclosure controls and procedures were effective as of the end of the period covered by this Annual Report.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Management&#x2019;s Annual Report on Internal Control Over Financial Reporting
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Our management is responsible for establishing and maintaining adequate internal control over financial reporting, as such term is defined in Exchange Act Rules&nbsp;13a
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;15(f). Under the supervision and with the participation of our management, including our principal executive officer and principal financial officer, we conducted an evaluation of the effectiveness of our internal control over financial reporting based on the framework in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Internal Control&#x2014;Integrated Framework
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	issued by the Committee of Sponsoring Organizations of the Treadway Commission (2013 framework). Based on our evaluation under the framework in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Internal Control&#x2014;Integrated Framework
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, our management concluded that our internal control over financial reporting was effective as of December&nbsp;31, 201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The effectiveness of our internal control over financial reporting as of December&nbsp;31, 201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	has been audited by Ernst&nbsp;&amp; Young&nbsp;LLP, an independent registered public accounting firm, as stated in its attestation report which is set forth below in this Annual Report on Form&nbsp;10
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;K.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 8PT;LINE-HEIGHT:106.67%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 30PT;COLOR:#0563C1;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">

<EFX_AUDITORS_OPINION>
<A NAME="FIS_AUDITORS_OPINION_2"></A>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Report of Independent Registered Public Accounting Firm
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The Board of Directors and Stockholders of Rigel Pharmaceuticals,&nbsp;Inc.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	We have audited Rigel Pharmaceuticals,&nbsp;Inc.&#x2019;s internal control over financial reporting as of December&nbsp;31, 201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, based on criteria established in Internal Control&#x2014;Integrated Framework issued by the Committee of Sponsoring Organizations of the Treadwa
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	y Commission (2013 framework) (the COSO criteria
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	). Rigel Pharmaceuticals,&nbsp;Inc.&#x2019;s management is responsible for maintaining effective internal control over financial reporting, and for its assessment of the effectiveness of internal control over financial reporting included in the accompanying Management&#x2019;s Annual Report on Internal Control Over Financial Reporting. Our responsibility is to express an opinion on the Company&#x2019;s internal control over financial reporting based on our audit.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	We conducted our audit in accordance with the standards of the Public Company Accounting Oversight Board (United States). Those standards require that we plan and perform the audit to obtain reasonable assurance about whether effective internal control over financial reporting was maintained in all material respects. Our audit included obtaining an understanding of internal control over financial reporting, assessing the risk that a material weakness exists, testing and evaluating the design and operating effectiveness of internal control based on the assessed risk, and performing such other procedures as we considered necessary in the circumstances. We believe that our audit provides a reasonable basis for our opinion.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	A company&#x2019;s internal control over financial reporting is a process designed to provide reasonable assurance regarding the reliability of financial reporting and the preparation of financial statements for external purposes in accordance with generally accepted accounting principles. A company&#x2019;s internal control over financial reporting includes those policies and procedures that (1)&nbsp;pertain to the maintenance of records that, in reasonable detail, accurately and fairly reflect the transactions and dispositions of the assets of the company; (2)&nbsp;provide reasonable assurance that transactions are recorded as necessary to permit preparation of financial statements in accordance with generally accepted accounting principles, and that receipts and expenditures of the company are being made only in accordance with authorizations of management and directors of the company; and (3)&nbsp;provide reasonable assurance regarding prevention or timely detection of unauthorized acquisition, use, or disposition of the company&#x2019;s assets that could have a material effect on the financial statements.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Because of its inherent limitations, internal control over financial reporting may not prevent or detect misstatements. Also, projections of any evaluation of effectiveness to future periods are subject to the risk that controls may become inadequate because of changes in conditions, or that the degree of compliance with the policies or procedures may deteriorate.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	In our opinion, Rigel Pharmaceuticals,&nbsp;Inc. maintained, in all material respects, effective internal control over financial reporting as of December&nbsp;31, 201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, based on the COSO criteria.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	We also have audited, in accordance with the standards of the Public Company Accounting Oversight Board (United States), the balance sheets of Rigel Pharmaceuticals,&nbsp;Inc. as of December&nbsp;31, 201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	and 201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	4
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, and the related statements of operations, comprehensive loss, stockholders&#x2019; equity, and cash flows for each of the three years in the period ended December&nbsp;31, 201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	of Rigel Pharmaceuticals,&nbsp;Inc. and our report dated
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	March
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	8
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, 2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	expressed an unqualified opinion thereon.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	/s/
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Ernst&nbsp;&amp; Young
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;LLP
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Redwood City, California
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	March
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	8
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, 2016
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 8PT;LINE-HEIGHT:106.67%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:24PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	70
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">

	&nbsp;
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage72"></A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 30PT;COLOR:#0563C1;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<A HREF="#RIGL-20151231X10K_HTM_TOC">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#0563C1;">
	Table of Contents
</FONT>
</A>
</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Changes in Internal Controls over Financial Reporting
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	There were no changes in our internal control over financial reporting that occurred during the fourth quarter of 201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	that have materially affected, or are reasonably likely to materially affect, our internal control over financial reporting.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Limitations on Effectiveness of Controls and Procedures
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	In designing and evaluating the disclosure controls and procedures, management recognizes that any controls and procedures, no matter how well designed and operated, can provide only reasonable assurance of achieving the desired control objectives. In addition, the design of disclosure controls and procedures must reflect the fact that there are resource constraints and that management is required to apply judgment in evaluating the benefits of possible controls and procedures relative to their costs.
</FONT>
</P>

</FONT>

<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P>

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 6PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:6PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	POWER OF ATTORNEY
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	KNOW ALL PERSONS BY THESE PRESENTS, that each person whose signature appears below constitutes and appoints Raul
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	R.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Rodriguez and Ryan D. Maynard, and each of them, as his true and lawful attorneys
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;fact and agents, with full power of substitution and resubstitution, for him and in his name, place, and stead, in any and all capacities, to sign any and all amendments to this Annual Report on Form&nbsp;10
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;K, and to file the same, with all exhibits thereto, and other documents in connection therewith, with the Securities and Exchange Commission, granting unto said attorneys
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;fact and agents, and each of them, full power and authority to do and perform each and every act and thing requisite and necessary to be done in connection therewith, as fully to all intents and purposes as he might or could do in person, hereby ratifying and confirming that all said attorneys
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;fact and agents, or any of them or their or his substitute or substitutes, may lawfully do or cause to be done by virtue hereof.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Pursuant to the requirements of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934, this Annual Report on Form&nbsp;10
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;K has been signed below by the following persons on behalf of the Registrant and in the capacities and on the dates indicated:
</FONT>
</P>

<EFX_EXPERTS_CONSENT>
<A NAME="FIS_EXPERTS_CONSENT_2"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	CONSENT OF INDEPENDENT RE
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	GISTERED PUBLIC ACCOUNTING FIRM
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	We consent to the incorporation by reference in the following Registration Statements:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT 72PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;TEXT-INDENT: -36PT;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(1)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 27PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Registration Statements (Form&nbsp;S
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#8209;8 Nos.&nbsp;333
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#8209;51184, 333
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#8209;106532, 333
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#8209;125895 and 333
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#8209;148132) pertaining to the 2000 Equity Incentive Plan, the 2000 Employee Stock Purchase Plan and the 2000 Non
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#8209;Employee Directors&#x2019; Stock Option Plan of Rigel Pharmaceuticals,&nbsp;Inc.,
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT 72PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;TEXT-INDENT: -36PT;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(2)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 27PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

</A>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Exhibit&nbsp;31.1
</FONT>
</P>
<EFX_CERTIFICATION>
<A NAME="FIS_CERTIFICATION"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	CERTIFICATIONS
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	I, Raul
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	R.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Rodriguez, certify that:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT 36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;TEXT-INDENT: -36PT;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	1.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 30PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	I have reviewed this Annual Report on Form&nbsp;10
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#8209;K of Rigel Pharmaceuticals,&nbsp;Inc.;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT 36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;TEXT-INDENT: -36PT;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 30PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Based on my knowledge, this report does not contain any untrue statement of a material fact or omit to state a material fact necessary to make the statements made, in light of the circumstances under which such statements were made, not misleading with respect to the period covered by this report;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT 36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;TEXT-INDENT: -36PT;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	3.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 30PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Based on my knowledge, the financial statements, and other financial information included in this report, fairly present in all material respects the financial condition, results of operations and cash flows of the registrant as of, and for, the periods presented in this report;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT 36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;TEXT-INDENT: -36PT;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	4.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 30PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The registrant&#x2019;s other certifying officer(s) and I are responsible for establishing and maintaining disclosure controls and procedures (as defined in Exchange Act Rules&nbsp;13a
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#8209;15(e) and 15d
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#8209;15(e)) and internal control over financial reporting (as defined in Exchange Act Rules&nbsp;13a
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#8209;15(f) and 15d
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#8209;15(f)) for the registrant and have:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT 72PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;TEXT-INDENT: -36PT;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	a)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 30PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Designed such disclosure controls and procedures, or caused such disclosure controls and procedures to be designed under our supervision, to ensure that material information relating to the registrant, including its consolidated subsidiaries, is made known to us by others within those entities, particularly during the period in which this report is being prepared;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT 72PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;TEXT-INDENT: -36PT;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	b)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 30PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Designed such internal control over financial reporting, or caused such internal control over financial reporting to be designed under our supervision, to provide reasonable assurance regarding the reliability of financial reporting and the preparation of financial statements for external purposes in accordance with generally accepted accounting principles;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT 72PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;TEXT-INDENT: -36PT;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	c)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 30PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Evaluated the effectiveness of the registrant&#x2019;s disclosure controls and procedures and presented in this report our conclusions about the effectiveness of the disclosure controls and procedures, as of the end of the period covered by this report based on such evaluation; and
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT 72PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;TEXT-INDENT: -36PT;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	d)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 30PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Disclosed in this report any change in the registrant&#x2019;s internal control over financial reporting that occurred during the registrant&#x2019;s most recent fiscal quarter (the registrant&#x2019;s fourth fiscal quarter in the case of an annual report) that has materially affected, or is reasonably likely to materially affect, the registrant&#x2019;s internal control over financial reporting; and
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT 36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;TEXT-INDENT: -36PT;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	5.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 30PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The registrant&#x2019;s other certifying officer(s) and I have disclosed, based on our most recent evaluation of internal control over financial reporting, to the registrant&#x2019;s auditors and the audit committee of the registrant&#x2019;s board of directors (or persons performing the equivalent functions):
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT 72PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;TEXT-INDENT: -36PT;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	a)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 30PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	All significant deficiencies and material weaknesses in the design or operation of internal control over financial reporting which are reasonably likely to adversely affect the registrant&#x2019;s ability to record, process, summarize and report financial information; and
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT 72PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;TEXT-INDENT: -36PT;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	b)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 30PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Any fraud, whether or not material, that involves management or other employees who have a significant role in the registrant&#x2019;s internal control over financial reporting.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Date: March&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	8
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, 201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	6
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%;">
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE;WIDTH: 100.00%;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;">

<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:8.82352941176471%;MARGIN-RIGHT:8.82352941176471%;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;TEXT-ALIGN:RIGHT;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<A NAME="RIGL-20151231EX3124522CD_HTM__GOBACK">
</A>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Exhibit&nbsp;31.2
</FONT>
</P>
<EFX_CERTIFICATION>
<A NAME="FIS_CERTIFICATION_2"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	CERTIFICATIONS
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	I, Ryan D. Maynard, certify that:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT 36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;TEXT-INDENT: -36PT;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	1.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 30PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	I have reviewed this Annual Report on Form&nbsp;10
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#8209;K of Rigel Pharmaceuticals,&nbsp;Inc.;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT 36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;TEXT-INDENT: -36PT;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 30PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Based on my knowledge, this report does not contain any untrue statement of a material fact or omit to state a material fact necessary to make the statements made, in light of the circumstances under which such statements were made, not misleading with respect to the period covered by this report;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT 36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;TEXT-INDENT: -36PT;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	3.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 30PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Based on my knowledge, the financial statements, and other financial information included in this report, fairly present in all material respects the financial condition, results of operations and cash flows of the registrant as of, and for, the periods presented in this report;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT 36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;TEXT-INDENT: -36PT;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	4.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 30PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The registrant&#x2019;s other certifying officer(s) and I are responsible for establishing and maintaining disclosure controls and procedures (as defined in Exchange Act Rules&nbsp;13a
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#8209;15(e) and 15d
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#8209;15(e)) and internal control over financial reporting (as defined in Exchange Act Rules&nbsp;13a
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#8209;15(f) and 15d
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#8209;15(f)) for the registrant and have:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT 72PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;TEXT-INDENT: -36PT;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	a)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 30PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Designed such disclosure controls and procedures, or caused such disclosure controls and procedures to be designed under our supervision, to ensure that material information relating to the registrant, including its consolidated subsidiaries, is made known to us by others within those entities, particularly during the period in which this report is being prepared;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT 72PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;TEXT-INDENT: -36PT;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	b)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 30PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Designed such internal control over financial reporting, or caused such internal control over financial reporting to be designed under our supervision, to provide reasonable assurance regarding the reliability of financial reporting and the preparation of financial statements for external purposes in accordance with generally accepted accounting principles;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT 72PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;TEXT-INDENT: -36PT;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	c)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 30PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Evaluated the effectiveness of the registrant&#x2019;s disclosure controls and procedures and presented in this report our conclusions about the effectiveness of the disclosure controls and procedures, as of the end of the period covered by this report based on such evaluation; and
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT 72PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;TEXT-INDENT: -36PT;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	d)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 30PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Disclosed in this report any change in the registrant&#x2019;s internal control over financial reporting that occurred during the registrant&#x2019;s most recent fiscal quarter (the registrant&#x2019;s fourth fiscal quarter in the case of an annual report) that has materially affected, or is reasonably likely to materially affect, the registrant&#x2019;s internal control over financial reporting; and
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT 36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;TEXT-INDENT: -36PT;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	5.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 30PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The registrant&#x2019;s other certifying officer(s) and I have disclosed, based on our most recent evaluation of internal control over financial reporting, to the registrant&#x2019;s auditors and the audit committee of the registrant&#x2019;s board of directors (or persons performing the equivalent functions):
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT 72PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;TEXT-INDENT: -36PT;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	a)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 30PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	All significant deficiencies and material weaknesses in the design or operation of internal control over financial reporting which are reasonably likely to adversely affect the registrant&#x2019;s ability to record, process, summarize and report financial information; and
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT 72PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;TEXT-INDENT: -36PT;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	b)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 30PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Any fraud, whether or not material, that involves management or other employees who have a significant role in the registrant&#x2019;s internal control over financial reporting.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Date: March&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	8

	, 2016

<EFX_CERTIFICATION>
<A NAME="FIS_CERTIFICATION_3"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	CERTIFICATION
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Pursuant to the requirement set forth in Rule&nbsp;13a
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#8209;14(b) of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934, as amended (the &#x201C;Exchange Act&#x201D;), and Section&nbsp;1350 of Chapter&nbsp;63 of Title 18 of the United States Code (18 U.S.C. &#xA7;1350), Raul
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	R.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Rodriguez, Chief Executive Officer of Rigel Pharmaceuticals,&nbsp;Inc. (the &#x201C;Company&#x201D;), and Ryan D. Maynard, Executive Vice President and Chief Financial Officer of the Company, each hereby certifies that, to the best of his knowledge:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT 72PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;TEXT-INDENT: -36PT;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	1.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 30PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The Company&#x2019;s Annual Report on Form&nbsp;10
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#8209;K for the period ended December&nbsp;31, 201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, to which this Certification is attached as Exhibit&nbsp;32.1 (the &#x201C;Annual Report&#x201D;) fully complies with the requirements of Section&nbsp;13(a) or Section&nbsp;15(d) of the Exchange Act; and
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT 72PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;TEXT-INDENT: -36PT;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 30PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The information contained in the Annual Report fairly presents, in all material respects, the financial condition and results of operations of the Company.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	In Witness Whereof, the undersigned have set their hands hereto as of March&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	8
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, 201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	6
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.
</FONT>
</P>
